did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: The Town of Wilton Collection is a small collection containing historical information about the Town of Wilton.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the G&B Cultural Center.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item Description, Date], Town of Wilton Collection, [Item no., Box no.], G&B Cultural Center, Wilton, Conn.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The neighborhood of Georgetown is located partially within the Town of Wilton, Conn. Wilton was incorporated as a town in 1802.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The Town of Wilton Collection includes annual reports of the Town of Wilton and other select government documents, information on local entertainments and celebrations, postcards of Wilton landmarks, maps, a pamphlet on Wilton history, and some items relating to the neighborhood of Branchville, and to the actress June Havoc's residence in Cannondale.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Collections
relatedmaterial.p: Additional archival materials on Wilton are held by the Wilton History Room and the Wilton Historical Society.
